documents.uploadDocumentsInfo: Select the documents you want to upload
documents.uploadSelectTitle: Select a file or drag & drop it here
documents.confluenceLoadDescription: Provide your Confluence credentials and choose a space key or CQL filter
documents.confluenceQueryHint: Leave fields blank to load the whole space or supply a Confluence Query Language (CQL) expression to filter pages
documents.sitemapLoadDescription: Enter a sitemap URL to extract and load content from all linked pages
documents.sitemapContinueOnFailureHint: Skip pages that fail to load instead of aborting the crawl
documents.confluenceLocked: Confluence Loader is busy. Please try again later
documents.sitemapLocked: Sitemap Loader is busy. Please try again later
